#summary Details on getNotificationSettings() API function
#sidebar ApiFunctions

Call this function to get your notifications settings.

For more informations about Delcampe's notifications, see [Notifications].

=== Call ===

 * syntax : getNotificationSettings(string token)

 * parameter 1 : _string_ : secret token

=== Response ===

 * response : _array_ : the response is always an array of 2 elements
  * element 1 : _boolean_ : true (if call ok) or false (if call not ok)
  * element 2 : 
   * if call ok : _array_ : list of your notifications settings
   * if call not ok : _string_ : error message 

 * example : 
   * array(true, )


=== Code example (PHP) ===
{{{
//FUNCTION CALL
$objSoapClient = new SoapClient('http://api.delcampe.net/soap.php?wsdl');
list($success, $token) = $objSoapClient->authenticateUser('MyPersonalApiKey');

if (true === $success) {
  $return = $objSoapClient->addNotificationSetting($token, 'Curl_Seller_Item_Add', 'http://www.mysite.net/feedback_api.php?token=bob');
}
}}}
